create table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ALI_FANEXOD", "ATER", "", "D") ?>

	CLAVE	VARCHAR2(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,

	LUNES	NUMBER(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	MARTES	NUMBER(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	MIERCOLES	NUMBER(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	JUEVES	NUMBER(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	VIERNES	NUMBER(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	TOTAL	NUMBER(15,1) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>,
	PROMEDIO	NUMBER(15) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>
)
truncate table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ALI_FANEXOD", "ATER", "", "D") ?>
delete from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ALI_FANEXOD", "ATER", "", "D") ?>

insert into	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ALI_FANEXOD", "ATER", "", "D") ?> 
( 
	CLAVE,
	CLAVE_1 
	,LUNES,
	MARTES,
	MIERCOLES,
	JUEVES,
	VIERNES,
	TOTAL,
	PROMEDIO 
) 

select
    CLAVE,
	CLAVE_1   
  ,0,
	0,
	0,
	0,
	0,
	0,
	0 
FROM (	


select 	
	TRIM(ATER_PARAMETROS.CLAVE) CLAVE,
	TRIM(ATER_PARAMETROS.CLAVE_1) CLAVE_1 
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATER_PARAMETROS", "ATER", "", "D")?>   ATER_PARAMETROS
where		(1=1)	

And (ATER_PARAMETROS.FORMULARIO = 'FANEXOD')




)    ODI_GET_FROM
